song.title: Drink Up
song.lyrics:
Yo, TJ!
Shout Richard Daley
Tell him say, fi tell the sound man dem, dem fi ready
And line up the lawn man!
Drinkers, drink up
(Hiccup!)
Drinkers, drink up
(Hiccup!)
Aye

We gon' party tonight
Drink some champagne
Smoke some weed
Don't judge me
For one day we will die
So let's live our life
So let's live our life

Star life, like R2-D2
Pretty girl come through, inna the see-through
Meet you at the gate, or pree soul
Real gold, Ace of Spades, fi the queens view
It means you, necessary, any means boo
Gucci shirt, with me Cavalry jeans boot
Brand new Clarks, sneakers, sneak preview

We gon' party tonight
Drink some champagne
Smoke some weed
Don't judge me
For one day we will die
So let's live our life
So let's live our life

Tell, tell me weh the drinks gone
Aztec, Maya, everything gone
Tell the bartender, bring the bar come
Quicker than a asteroid, when the star come
Drinks everywhere now
Hand inna the air now
Like say me a go rob you
But me nah rob you

We gon' party tonight
Drink some champagne
Smoke some weed
Don't judge me
For one day we will die
So let's live our life
So let's live our life

Third verse and the building a burn down
Policeman say, "turn the sound down"
The business done have a Downsound
Big up the people weh hustle downtown
When we party, we high, like uptown
Gaza, Boston, yo Bob Town
Craig Town, Park Heights, and Flatbush
Mexico, Grass Hill

We gon' party tonight
Drink some champagne
Smoke some weed
Don't judge me
For one day we will die
So let's live our life
So let's live our life

vocabulary.explanation: Used to indicate purpose or intention, similar to 'to' or 'for' in English.
example_sentences: Mi a go fi di food later.
Tell him fi come quick.
Wi need fi finish di work today.

vocabulary.explanation: Means 'in' or 'inside'.
example_sentences: Di keys deh inna di car.
Mi live inna Kingston.
Put it inna di bag.

vocabulary.explanation: To observe or look at something closely.
example_sentences: Mi a pree di new car.
Pree how dem a dance.
Him always a pree di situation.

vocabulary.explanation: Means 'where' or 'what'.
example_sentences: Weh yuh deh?
Tell mi weh yuh want.
Weh di party a keep?

vocabulary.explanation: Means 'not' or 'won't'.
example_sentences: Mi nah go today.
Him nah listen to mi.
She nah eat dat.

vocabulary.explanation: To give respect or shout out to someone.
example_sentences: Big up mi friend dem.
Mi haffi big up di DJ.
Big up yuhself!

vocabulary.explanation: Used to indicate plural, similar to 'them' or 'those'.
example_sentences: Di people dem happy.
Mi see di car dem outside.
Di song dem nice.

vocabulary.explanation: Asking where the drinks have gone.
example_sentences: Weh di drinks gone? Mi nuh see dem.
Weh di food gone?
Weh di money gone?

vocabulary.explanation: To be on fire or destroyed by fire.
example_sentences: Di house burn down last night.
Di building a burn down.
Di candle burn down quick.

vocabulary.explanation: To work hard, often in informal or street contexts.
example_sentences: Mi haffi hustle fi di money.
Dem a hustle downtown.
Him always a hustle.

vocabulary.explanation: To organize or arrange in a line.
example_sentences: Line up di chairs dem.
Di people dem line up fi di show.
Mi a go line up di books.

vocabulary.explanation: A brief look or preview of something.
example_sentences: Mi get a sneak preview of di movie.
Dem gi mi a sneak preview of di song.
Wi get a sneak preview of di event.

vocabulary.explanation: Living a glamorous or high-profile lifestyle.
example_sentences: Him a live di star life.
She love di star life.
Di star life nuh easy.

vocabulary.explanation: Genuine or authentic gold.
example_sentences: Di chain a real gold.
Mi buy a real gold ring.
Him love real gold jewelry.

vocabulary.explanation: Something that is needed or essential.
example_sentences: It necessary fi study hard.
Di tools dem necessary fi di job.
Wi need di necessary documents.

vocabulary.explanation: Completely new, unused.
example_sentences: Mi buy a brand new car.
Di shoes dem brand new.
She have a brand new phone.

vocabulary.explanation: To have a celebration or gathering in the evening.
example_sentences: Wi a go party tonight.
Dem plan fi party tonight.
Party tonight at mi yard.

vocabulary.explanation: To enjoy life and make the most of it.
example_sentences: Wi fi live our life to di fullest.
Dem always a live dem life.
Live yuh life and be happy.

vocabulary.explanation: To consume marijuana.
example_sentences: Dem a go smoke some weed later.
Him love fi smoke some weed.
Wi smoke some weed at di party.

vocabulary.explanation: A request not to be judged or criticized.
example_sentences: Mi a do mi own thing, don't judge me.
Don't judge me fi mi choices.
She say don't judge me when mi a eat.

vocabulary.explanation: To raise one's hand up, often in celebration.
example_sentences: Put yuh hand inna the air if yuh happy.
Di crowd have dem hand inna the air.
Raise yuh hand inna the air fi di music.

vocabulary.explanation: To instruct the bartender to do something.
example_sentences: Tell the bartender fi bring more drinks.
Mi a go tell the bartender fi mix a cocktail.
Tell the bartender mi want a beer.

vocabulary.explanation: Very fast, faster than an asteroid.
example_sentences: Him run quicker than a asteroid.
Di car move quicker than a asteroid.
She finish di work quicker than a asteroid.

vocabulary.explanation: The building is on fire or being destroyed by fire.
example_sentences: Di building a burn down, call di fire brigade.
Wi see di building a burn down from far.
Di building a burn down, everybody run out.

vocabulary.explanation: To lower the volume of the sound.
example_sentences: Di police say fi turn the sound down.
Mi haffi turn the sound down at night.
Turn the sound down, it too loud.
